website_summaries.verdict: With room to spare and an intuitive timer dial vs. touchpad, this heavy-duty microwave has room to spare for larger dishes.
pros: No turntable that might need to be replaced, although users feel one leads to more even cooking
Long-lasting whether it's used by multiple people in an office setting or at home
Heats food and beverages very quickly
cons: May not have as much subtle functionality – such as defrost – as microwaves with touch controls

customer_reviews.title: cavity face plate cracked
customer_reviews.text: I had this microwave for only 14 months. The ceramic shelve has 3 long cracks since last week. I use the microwave very seldom and then only for heating up leftovers on a plate or in a bowl. I never use more then 2 minutes. I called customer service for Sharp. They were not helpful at all and very unfriendly. They do not even sell the ceramic shelve and that part is not under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST MICROWAVE EVERY
customer_reviews.text: It is more than a standard "disposable" microwave, BUT it's so so simple to use, 1/2 page directions vs 5 pages NO CLOCK to RESET every time power goes off, unplugged... NO more flashing zeros. Timer limited to 6 mins, helping to prevent over cooking accidents. No turntable to fail, clean. Inside ceramic and SS easy to clean. Stellar, Fantastic, Best Ever Will buy again. (fyi last heavy duty commercial Sharp MW I got lasted 30 yrs) oh and this is heavy, 2 or 3 x standard disposable MW. (only reason it didn't get 5 stars, first unit arrived DOA, had to return and replace, but Amazon made return so, so, so simple, sent UPS with label next day)
customer_reviews.author: SaRAoRAH

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk, failed in less than 2 years! my 50 bucks sunbeam microwave lasted longer than this, paid over 250 bucks for an unreliable piece of junk, commercial? GTfoutta here, use this on average 7-10 times a day (non-commercial use), right before the two years anniversary, it failed on us, the microwave would turn on but no heat. Awful reliability, SHARP, please stop making microwave, you are bad at it.
customer_reviews.author: LifeOnaSandBar

customer_reviews.title: Disposable!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it while it lasted which was just over two years then not worth repairing. I guess I should feel lucky after reading other reviews that I actually got two full years out of this “Quality” Product by Sharp. Fouled me once but not again. I’ll buy a cheap microwave and assume I’ll be replacing it within 1-2 years. Sad how electronics/appliances seem to be designed to wear out and need replacement so quickly!
customer_reviews.author: shawn michael doering

customer_reviews.title: The Knob is brilliant !  This is an excellent microwave oven.
customer_reviews.text: The twist-knob works extremely well. Twist to set timer. Then the red circle indicates progress toward time. This much better than a numeric keypad or push-button interface. Never sure if it's seconds or minutes or heat-intensity setting. Once you've tried the knob, you will never go back to a numeric keypad. A twist-knob should be standard for ALL microwave ovens. It's particularly good for children or impaired adults - it's much safer to operate. It's more "accessible", for handicapped people, and for everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Bucci

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you want a unit that lasts
customer_reviews.text: One month after 2 years the magnetron failed. Verified that the HVR diode is fine. I also, like many others, bought this because a commercial unit should last for years of heavy use. I used for 25 months of maybe once a day. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: James McElroy

customer_reviews.title: Basic and Hopefully Reliable.
customer_reviews.text: A dead simple microwave bought for warming things. So far the one thing I miss is variable power to also give it convenient defrosting capability. Bought primarily for reliability as there are lots of less expensive Microwave ovens with more features at lower prices. Prior microwave ovens in the family have lasted for 20 years to 5 or so. The simplest was the longest lasting and was made in Japan or the USA in about 1975. Indestructible little monster with the same basic 1 dial control as this one. Hopefully the "Commercial" means long term reliability. If it does not I will be back to revise this. Considering my age if it survives me it will have done the job.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Read before you buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this microwave to use in my C-Store, package arrive on time and was installed. The microwave worked great for about 5 days and then just quit. The whole purchase was wasteful and will never buy Sharp again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully the last microwave oven I'll ever buy...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Extremely simple, which is good for reliability. So many other microwaves had so many reviews telling of failure after just a few months, which is why I bought this one. It has far fewer moving parts, far fewer bells and whistles, but that is good for reliability. I don't claim to be a gifted judge of a microwave oven's cooking ability--able to say that this one heats better or more evenly or more whatever than other microwave ovens. For my purposes--reheating leftovers, cooking frozen dinners, heating up a cup of water--this one is quite adequate. And its simplicity has me believing that it's the last microwave oven I'll ever buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mc.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty sitting in my countertop with the turquiose accents and industrial look. Love that there is no plate to clean. Don't love that you have to squeeze the handle to open the door but that's pretty petty. And don't love the giant plug and back shape that makes it impossible to sit against the wall. Had to use an extension cord and bundle the cord under the microwave to reclaim some more counterspace.
customer_reviews.author: BreeCan2

customer_reviews.title: These things are robust and work great. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I uses there in the lunch room of a business. I have some still in service from 2008, no issues. the 80 dollar ones from costco go out in about 2-3 years. These things are robust and work great. Easy to use, no complicated electronics to fail or buttons to wear out. simple for anyone to use. They are power full also.
customer_reviews.author: a c

customer_reviews.title: BOUGHT THIS FOR THE OFFICE. EVERYONE LOVES IT AND ...
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THIS FOR THE OFFICE. EVERYONE LOVES IT AND ONE OF MY CO WORKERS WANTED TO BUY ONE FOR HOME. ITS VERY SIMPLE TO USE. JUST BE CAREFUL THAT IF YOU OPEN THE DOOR AND THE FOOD IS NOT DONE IT WILL RESET SO REMEMBER HOW MANY MINUTES YOU HAVE LEFT IF YOUR TIMING A FOOD ITEM. NO SPINDLE BUT DOESNT NEED ONE WE JUST PUT A PAPER TOWEL DOWN ON THE BOTTOM IT HEATS EVENLY
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: I have been very disappointed. It is much less powerful than other ovens ...
customer_reviews.text: There needs to balance brought to the Force. I bought this oven because of the high reviews it received. I have been very disappointed. It is much less powerful than other ovens I've had. Re-heat times are longer than with my previous oven. I've had it for 2 or 3 months now on the internal light has already burned out. If you want a simple but underpowered microwave, this model is for you. If you what to reheat/cook your food at the speed you are accustomed to, buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Simple, built well
customer_reviews.text: Our family has joined the consumer revolt against over-complicated appliances with frivolous "features" that boost the price but not the practical value. I think the tipping point was the washer we saw with GPS and wi-fi. This Sharp Commercial Microwave Oven first caught my eye at a business, when it dawned on me that some companies continue to make rugged, purpose-built appliances. I was delighted to find this one on Amazon, and in the first month's use, our expectations have been met and satisfaction is high.
customer_reviews.author: P. Carson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy use but only lasted 2 years then just stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this microwave!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this microwave!!! I love not having a turntable! I love that it is easy to put in square dishes or multiple bowls. I love the ease of turning one knob rather than pushing multiple buttons. There is a tiny bit of a learning curve with how long to cook/reheat things, but in the end, it is so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: PA

customer_reviews.title: Great Microwave
customer_reviews.text: I read lots of reviews and looked at lots of microwaves. I kept putting off buying this because of the price!! I wasted all that time!! This was well worth the money!!!!!!! I love the simplicity and ease of use!! This microwave makes me really happy! In addition, it's a really nice looking appliance!
customer_reviews.author: Den M

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave other than the extensive damage that it came with...free of charge.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Pourciau

customer_reviews.title: Seems very well built, weighs more than the full featured micro that it replaced.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure how I was going to like this unit after going through 2 microwaves in the last 5 years that had all the bells and whistles. But, as all the reviews before me have said , there’s nothing wrong with a good dependable simple to use machine. I usually read the owners manual before I use a new product but even if I didn’t it wouldve been very easy to understand how to use it. I just hope it works as long as the reviews lead you to believe.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: This Microwave is not good
customer_reviews.text: The Microwave went bad already. Not even quite 4 months since It was purchased. I’ll never buy this type of microwave ever. It also appeared to be used. I noticed upon purchase but I thought it would be ok but was proven wrong, when it blew out.
customer_reviews.author: kwa

customer_reviews.title: Nice and priced right
customer_reviews.text: Been in use for almost a year and no problems. Easy to use. Turn the knob to the amount of seconds you want. One down side the color behind the knob showing the time you selected could have been built a little more pronounced and brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Ahrsol

customer_reviews.title: Simply Perfect Microwave...
customer_reviews.text: I love this microwave!!! It is everything I need in a microwave without the unnecessary bells and whistles.I did not previously have a microwave...mostly because when visiting others who own microwave ovens, each one has it's own unique and confusing method of operation. I found their many buttons for "programming" always confused me to the point I decided i did not want one. This microwave is so simple anyone could operate it. It is well built, easy to clean cooks food quickly and evenly. Any guests at my house will not need to ask how to operate,this is a commercial microwave so it is built to endure many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: It is so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time. It is so easy to use, just turn the knob and it cooks! My kids love it. I read other reviews that the light does not go on when cooking but this one does. You can see your food while microwaving it. I don't know if they modified this because of the earlier reviews but it now works just fine. The stainless steel interior and plastic base makes it easy to clean! I have had it for several months now and so far I have not had any problems. It looks durable and I hope it lasts. Thanks, I think its a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: It's triple the price, but it's the Mercedes Benz of microwaves.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This ultra-deluxe micrwave costs triple the price, but its quality, features and convenience are on a whole other level. If you use a microwave many times a day, you'll be glad you opted for this.
customer_reviews.author: Atlas Bugged

customer_reviews.title: I was recently looking for an easy to use microwave oven for a rental property
customer_reviews.text: I was recently looking for an easy to use microwave oven for a rental property. The dial interface on this model is SUPER easy to use and doesn't distract or confuse with 500 different and mostly unnecessary options. It's slightly more expensive than other home use models but well worth it because of the convenience.
customer_reviews.author: car guy

customer_reviews.title: For that I'd still recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Objectively heats only as well as my old cheapo 800W microwave. However this is well made and intuitive to use, does not have a rotating plate, and can hold four large bowls at the same time. For that I'd still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tornato Seven

customer_reviews.title: It is a lot better than my previous microwave
customer_reviews.text: The timer does not go beyond six minutes ... It is a lot better than my previous microwave ...
customer_reviews.author: behrouz fathali,behrouz fathali

customer_reviews.title: well made, simple to operate, great for elderly,
customer_reviews.text: fabulous product for elderly lady. i ordered this because i was unable to locate a well made, name brand, microwave oven that had 1. a handle to pull open not one of those annoying buttons that gets stuck and 2. a dial to set time easily. not those annoying digital displays which are so difficult to u nderstand. my mum loves this! its well made, the inside is all metal and will be easy to clean. im very pleased, so much so that i may buy one for myself!!
customer_reviews.author: Monkeypony

customer_reviews.title: The Simplicity and ruggedness of this microwave is what makes ...
customer_reviews.text: The Simplicity and ruggedness of this microwave is what makes it valuable to me there's nothing complicated about it you put in your food to turn the dial and you walk away there's no buttons to look for search for no settings you need to find it's just heat up your food and be done with it
customer_reviews.author: bwehn

customer_reviews.title: Looks good to me
customer_reviews.text: Looks very sturdy and well made. It is very easy to use and keep clean. My wife and I are very pleased and hope it has a long life which would be unusual for the Microwaves we have bought over the years. It costs more than the average Microwave but it looks like its good for the long hall.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: ... this a couple days ago but so far we love it. Looks great on the granite counter and ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received this a couple days ago but so far we love it. Looks great on the granite counter and easy to use. I researched online for a few weeks before deciding on this commercial unit. Delivery was fast.
customer_reviews.author: samme b

customer_reviews.title: I liked the unit while I had it
customer_reviews.text: I liked the unit while I had it, but it died within 5 weeks. My Panasonic lasted 2 years. Minimum of 5 days before Sharp service can have a technician out here = I'm buying a new unit, and it definitely won't be a Sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean. Heats evenly
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 4.5 stars if offered. I would make it 5 star if there were at least a timer up to 20 min and a half power function. I would also prefer the midrange 1100 watt. Otherwise, I love the ease of use. Things really do heat evenly without the carousel so you can put in rectangular objects. Love that feature. Also love that the glass bottom makes this so easy to clean. Overall I'm hoping this will be "'ol reliable" for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H

customer_reviews.title: Keep it simple
customer_reviews.text: Finally a microwave that performs well without the annoying turntable that would tend to come out of the track. This sharp is simple and clean. I love having a door handle to avoid finger marks and breakage - the area around the push button on my prior Panasonic unit was always messy and a poor design for longevity. The Panasonic lasted but 9 months. I hope the Sharp gives several years of service.
customer_reviews.author: heyjude

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: As a person with vision impairment, I can't use those flat control panel that is so common on applicances now a day. This microwave is so simple to use, just one big knob and no LCD display. I just turn the knob and count the number of clicks to set the cooking time, so simple. No turn table, no problem, the food heated evenly, it makes clean up so easy with nothing in the way. It seem like a solidly built machine.
customer_reviews.author: WiseOldMan

customer_reviews.title: Ordered it for my mother who can see well and ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for my mother who can see well and is 92. One knob does it. No complicated menu of clocks times and defrost modes. Heavy duty construction (same model as the ones we have at work that get continuous duty, tougher than those meant for your home, but heavier too.)
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hanley

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLE TO OPERATE
customer_reviews.text: EASY TO READ CONTROLS, NOT TO NOISY, FAIRLY COMPACT AND EFFICIENT. ALSO LIKE THE NO TURNTABLE FEATURE
customer_reviews.author: Out door Mike

customer_reviews.title: Buying a 2nd after lightning killed the 1st
customer_reviews.text: Like many I saw these at work getting used by 100's of people everyday and not dying. I decided to buy one for my family and it was one of those things that you never noticed because it just worked. It is simple and it is easy to clean. It died today from the power surge and am purchasing another because there still isn't anything as simple, reliable, and cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: sarah moulton

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous. I'm a teacher, and I bought this for my classroom. It will outlast me, I think! It's simple to use and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Puttie Cat

customer_reviews.title: It's a easy to use and definitely heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: It's a easy to use and definitely heavy duty. Love the dial and the countdown lights. Had it for a month now. Cooked a one pound raw sweet potato in six minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Rigger

customer_reviews.title: We love this microwave
customer_reviews.text: We love this microwave. The knob is the best part, of course. There's no power adjustment as far as I know, just time adjustment. There's no turntable, but things seem to heat perfectly evenly. When cooking, a light comes on inside, and you can see through the door. It's pretty spacious inside, big enough that we can easily slip a microwave dish cover in and out to cover food.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: 3 MONTHS IT BROKE HOME USE ONLY
customer_reviews.text: 3 MONTHS IT BROKE HOME USE ONLY. IT WORKED GREAT WHEN IT WORKED.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use 1 dial, no crazy 20 buttons to look through. I always hated having to put my glasses on to use microwave. Very easy to clean stainless steel interior with solid white, easy to clean bottom plate(without that turning table that always breaks). If your using it for home make sure you measure for it it is a lot deeper than a regular home microwave.
customer_reviews.author: GmaShops

customer_reviews.title: hardcore, old-school microwave
customer_reviews.text: I really do like the simplicity and no-frills nature of this microwave. Just can't stop looking at it for the time of day. I'm sure I'll adjust, but having a clock on it would make this perfect for our household.
customer_reviews.author: Abiyoyo

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLICITY AT ITS BEST
customer_reviews.text: Well built and simple to use. Stainless steel interior and front door. Metal frame. Turn the knob to the desired setting and close the door. Perfectly heated in less time than conventional microwaves. Oh, and the best part is that there is no turntable with glass to drive you crazy. The bottom is glass ceramic and easy to clean. You need to look no further for ease of use and reliability.
customer_reviews.author: katt

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave w/out all extra features you never use
customer_reviews.text: like I purchased a no frills, no defrost, no clock usual features. Just a plain microwave w/ease of use. Place dish, plate, turn timer & that's it. Less time, no problem, open door. Glad I purchased a commercial microwave, does the job & smaller in size than all the "frills" microwaves & I now have add'l counter space. Hope it lasts for yrs. but if needed to purchase again the no "frills" to me is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: bl

customer_reviews.title: works great. bought for my grandpa because it can only ...
customer_reviews.text: works great. bought for my grandpa because it can only be put on up to I think 6 mins a time which is better than his usual 20. I feel more safe with him having this microwave. it also shuts off if u open the door before the timer is done. he cant hear so it makes it easy for it not to run without food being in it.
customer_reviews.author: kfaul

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Basic as basic as you can get, purely simple to operate, evenly cooks surprisingly without a turntable. I'm very happy with it. basically it's either on or it's off
customer_reviews.author: electric

customer_reviews.title: Seems to cook extremely evenly. Oatmeal is cooked without ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to cook extremely evenly. Oatmeal is cooked without any bubbling. Frozen meals have no cold spots. I don't think I could ever go back to a "spinning plate" microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dejean

customer_reviews.title: It's a winner.
customer_reviews.text: In a nutshell, I like its elegant simplicity. It heats very evenly without needing a turntable. I can't attest to its durability, but it seems much better made than your run of the mill microwaves.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased this one
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the office lunch room. So glad I did as it's easy to use, looks nice and heats quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... just got it today and if it holds up like other reviews say I’ll love it even for the ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a microwave simple with clean lines just got it today and if it holds up like other reviews say I’ll love it even for the money.my old one still worked but showed lots of wear .plus this looks easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Shannon

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The oven is easy to use and kept clean. My only disappointment is the timer needs more options to cook longer.
customer_reviews.author: charles m jackson

customer_reviews.title: No buttons or beeps and no complaining from the spouse ...
customer_reviews.text: No buttons or beeps and no complaining from the spouse. Wish I had plunked down the money for this two microwaves ago. Had it for about four months now and never regretted the price.
customer_reviews.author: gidgit

customer_reviews.title: Try as they might they haven’t killed this one yet ...
customer_reviews.text: Try as they might they haven’t killed this one yet. Using on a breakroom for 20-30 staff daily for a year.
customer_reviews.author: HDD

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, reliable microwave!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this microwave after discarding an old Panasonic that had turned black inside. This new Sharp is very sturdy and easy to use. My husband especially appreciates the simplicity. We never used the features like defrost, variable power, etc., so this one perfectly meets our needs. Performance has been excellent so far!
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Nice study microwave
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to find a metal interior microwave at this price. Works goods and heats evenly. Note that when you open the door, the light does not turn on. Light turns on only when you power up the unit. Picture online was a little deceiving; The bottom is not metal. It's some kind of hi impact plastic. All in all, a good unit for this price.
customer_reviews.author: The man

customer_reviews.title: It is great, but it takes a little getting used to ...
customer_reviews.text: It is great, but it takes a little getting used to not having a low setting. You have to figure out how many seconds to keep pressing for lower temp cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Wil Conway

customer_reviews.title: Super simple control
customer_reviews.text: It heats stuff up, that's it. Super simple control; yes, not plural, there's only a knob. The only function I ever used on a microwave was to enter cook time and start. This microwave's knob combines the number keypad, start, and cancel buttons into the knob. Genius!!! Quality build and feel.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great, simple to use microwave.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Heavy use in our break room. I was looking for something with few moving parts and very simple electronics, this fits the bill well. Just pop in your food and turn the knob. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: L. Wintes

customer_reviews.title: Dial your way to heaven
customer_reviews.text: It's not as powerful as my defunct "inverter", but is so attractive and simple. Does what I need it for: reheating or making oatmeal. Dial is so easy to use and read. Love it. Love the handle, by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore

customer_reviews.title: Keep It Simple Stupid !!
customer_reviews.text: I believe in simplicity. The less parts the better. No fancy digital displays or settings for butter warming or defrosting grouse. Just a no nonsense and rugged microwave. Rotating turntable is no loss as it heats evenly and well. Nice stainless steel insides to clean. Hope to keep it for a time. The delivery was really quick. Who needs big box stores any more?? I will never use Best Buy again since they have gone done hill to the bottom....I would rather make my own mistakes than to have sales people make bold face lies to me.
customer_reviews.author: Chere

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good microwave. Sure it has no defrost, power settings or anything else besides a timer. But it is reliable, even heating, easy to clean and high quality build. Instructions tell you how to defrost.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: wasn't what I expected but I've learned to like it
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Uses it in the work lunchroom. works well. Lots of people use it.
customer_reviews.author: JFZ

customer_reviews.title: great design
customer_reviews.text: Awesome simple design. A single dial for time is the only control. No turntable means it is so easy to clean. You can open and close it nearly silently. It's not as powerful as many other microwaves but that's OK.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for factory breakroom
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is a real workhorse. I bought 7 of them for our factory breakroom. Our old microwaves were always breaking. These ones are ridiculously simple. No buttons, no settings ... just a dial to turn for how much time you need. This is ideal for busy breakrooms where the microwaves need to withstand a lot of wear and tear. Two years later and they are all still going strong and I know they are not treated gently. Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Falkenhayn

customer_reviews.title: Great unit at a great price very easy to use:-)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandfather because he wanted something simple without all th buttons. He raves about this unit and is extremely happy with it turn the dial and press start how much simpler can you get:-)
customer_reviews.author: Starfire

customer_reviews.title: Six Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great microwave for the person who does not want all the whistles and buzzers. It's essentially a close and play unit which I bought because I did not want any frills as I'd never used them before in previous microwaves I've owned. Pros: Easy to use Nice style Sturdy Does what it's supposed to do Cons: No turn table Wish the dial had up to 15 minutes No defrost cycle (but I knew that when I bought it) Note: I used this same model in a restaurant where I formerly worked and it's a work-horse. Lasted many years of commercial use.
customer_reviews.author: Tim P. Essebaggers

customer_reviews.title: Rock Solid Lunchroom Microwave
customer_reviews.text: This is a very simple and reliable microwave that is easy to keep clean and works well - we use them in a business break / lunch room and they get used heavily every day with no problems or issues. If you want fancy features or to defrost your big roast - this isn't for you. If lots of people need to heat up their lunch all day every day it is tough to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Dean A Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: heats things up fast & easy to clean...the only thing I don't like is that it doesn't have a clock or timer......but I can live with that.....there is a light inside once you set the dial to the length of time you want .....
customer_reviews.author: Mary-Frances Gagan

customer_reviews.title: Professional grade but not huge
customer_reviews.text: Solid quality. My last Sharp lasted over ten years. Wouldn’t consider a different brand now.
customer_reviews.author: LSB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice commercial unit. Have bought and installed several of these.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Santamont

customer_reviews.title: doesn't have any of the bells and whistle crap that always breaks
customer_reviews.text: works very well. doesn't have any of the bells and whistle crap that always breaks. simple and to the point. just the features you actually need.
customer_reviews.author: Carsten Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Love it, works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Love it, works as expected. Sides are painted a dark grey. Not so pretty from top/sides, but works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony E.

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the simplicity of this. No turn table. Waves come from bottom. Just dial your time and go. Paid for quality of components not variable programs I don't use. Either it's on or its off.
customer_reviews.author: connie stewart

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and to clean
customer_reviews.text: Well built, simple 1 dial operation. Easy to use and to clean. Well packaged. A great value.

customer_reviews.text: I am really like this compact microwave. It works well so far and looks cool. They were very shipped to my house. I have no complaint about them.

customer_reviews.text: Great commercial grade microwave...this thing gets used non stop in my catering kitchen. Easy to use controls and easy to keep clean.

customer_reviews.text: Simplicity at it's finest. Quality product. Meets all our needs.. Will never buy another microwave with all the bells and whistles again.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent & Practical!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent basic heavy duty microwave oven. Plain and practical. Easy to use. No turntable but it warms and cooks evenly and quickly. One speed and simple dial control which is used to turn it on and set the time from 10 seconds to 6 minutes. Very easy to keep Clean with the Comercial grade interior surfaces.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: nice looking and works exactly as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this microwave. It is quiet, works well and I like the dial, rather than a complex push button display. The final beep is not too loud and the inside looks very easy to clean

customer_reviews.text: This might just be the last microwave I'll ever own. It's sturdy, heats well, and easy to clean.

customer_reviews.text: Simple controls and ease of cleaning. Appears well made and well thought out. I couldn't ask for more. Also a great shopping experience. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: great microwave
customer_reviews.text: We have about 10 in the building and they work well and easy to use.so when we need to order more it will be the Sharp model. it fits on all the counters we have in our break rooms, we have been buying the Sharp Microwave for many years.

product_meta.title: Sharp R-21LCFS Medium Duty Commercial Microwave (Dial Timer, 1000-Watts, 120-Volts) (Update of R-21LCF)
product_meta.description: Sharp is dedicated to improving people's lives through the use of advanced technology and a commitment to innovation, quality, value, and design. The classic dial timer can be set anywhere from 10 seconds to 6 minutes and includes bright LED indicators that permits "at-a-glace" monitoring. The 1.0 cubic ft. capacity can accommodate a 13-1/2'' platter, prepackaged foods, single servings or a half-size pan in either direction. When the door is opened during cooking, the remaining time is cancelled; saving energy and increasing the magnetron's life. Stainless steel exterior wrap and interior for easy cleaning and a commercial look. A handy "on-the-spot" reference for timesaving convenience is located above the timer with recommended times for heating a variety of popular foods.
